text: Hayden Jerome Kramer, better known by his stage name Herobust, is an American electronic music DJ and record producer. His music style includes trap, bass and dubstep. His EP "I'm Aloud" peaked at #22 on the Billboard "Top Dance/Electronic Albums" chart in February 2016. Herobust has been featured on Rolling Stone, Vice, The Huffington Post and MTV. He is from Atlanta, Georgia. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:Living people Category:American DJs Category:American record producers Category:Musicians from Atlanta
title: Herobust
